attributes.background: 1 in 15 people in the UK have made a suicide attempt at least once at some point in their life. In 2013, our of 13,972 suicides 1,270 of them were preventable where the individual reached out to services less than 12 months prior to their death. Your friends and family are left to die every day.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like to see better services for people with mental health problems, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
